example.title: Resizing
example.metakeywords: php grid, php ajax grid, php datagrid, php gridview, ajax grid php
example.description: KoolGrid support column resizing. To enable this feature you can set $AllowResizing property to true. You can set this property at KoolGrid level, GridTableView level or at Column level.
